description: This file defines the interface for a time tracking utility, allowing creation, start, stop, and status checks of timers.

methods.name: timeTrackerCreate
methods.description: Creates a new time tracker object. Must be destroyed after use.

methods.name: timeTrackerDestroy
methods.description: Frees the allocated time tracker object.

methods.name: timeTrackerStart
methods.description: Starts the timer with a specified timeout in seconds.

methods.name: timeTrackerRunning
methods.description: Checks if the timer is currently running.

methods.name: timeTrackerExpired
methods.description: Checks if the timer has expired.

methods.name: timeTrackerSecondsUntilExpiration
methods.description: Returns the remaining seconds before the timer expires.

methods.name: timeTrackerElapsedSeconds
methods.description: Returns the number of seconds the timer has run or is running.

methods.name: timeTrackerDebug
methods.description: Outputs debug information about the timer state.
